title: Update Topics Block
body:
Update Topics Block¶

The Update Topics block allows you to add or remove contacts from a topic.
To use this block, you will need to have navigated to the workflow design tab. Click here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Place an Update Topics block in your workflow where desired

  2. Select Add to topic or Remove from topic

  3. Click Choose a topic

  4. Select an existing topic

  5. Alternatively, click Add New to create a new topic (this topic will automatically be chosen)

  6. Click Done
